keyPolicies.policyDescription: Campaigned to save the Whittington A&E and police stations, holds annual apprenticeship events, protects libraries, green spaces and keeps local services.
Lowest paid workers taken out of income tax, extra £ for disadvantaged pupils and schools, Lynne is the originator and architect of Equal Marriage.
£35 million global campaign to end FGM, protected the aid budget, announced new drive to put disability rights at forefront of world development agenda.

mentions.tacticalSituation: The election race in this area is between Lynne and Labour only, hundreds of Conservative and Labour supporters have pledged their support for their local candidate Lynne.

issues.economy: Lowest paid workers taken out of income tax.
issues.education: Extra £ for disadvantaged pupils and schools.
issues.environment: Campaigned to save the Whittington A&E and police stations, protects libraries, green spaces.
issues.health: Campaigned to save the Whittington A&E.
issues.socialWelfare: £35 million global campaign to end FGM, protected the aid budget, announced new drive to put disability rights at forefront of world development agenda.

quotes.text: An effective and popular constituency MP.
Equal marriage legislation was her baby and she pushed the scandal of Female Genital Mutilation to the top of the agenda.
Well regarded locally for keeping Labour-controlled Haringey Council on it’s toes.
Expenses saint... One of the frugal few.
Write off Ms Featherstone at your peril.

images.caption: Lynne Featherstone with supporters holding signs saying 'SAVED'
